CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name , "Amendment - ODE and Center - Change of Capacity / Space", CLQ_Approval_Date__c , "Amendment- FCC - Change of Capacity / Space", CLQ_Approval_Date__c , "Amendment - ODE - Change of Location",CLQ_Approved_First_Day_at_New_Address__c, "Amendment - FCC - Change of Location",CLQ_Approved_First_Day_at_New_Address__c, "Amendment - Center - Change of Location",CLQ_Approved_First_Day_at_New_Address__c, "Application - ODE Program", CLQ_License_Start_Date__c , "Application - Day Camp",CLQ_Application_Approved__c, "Renew Application - Day Camp",CLQ_Application_Approved__c, "Approval Closure",CLQ_Last_Day_of_Operation__c, "Application - FCC",CLQ_License_Start_Date__c , "Application - CC Center",CLQ_License_Start_Date__c , "Update Outdoor Space Information",CLQ_Submission_Date__c+1, "In-Home Aide",CLQ_Certificate_Issue_Date__c,NULL)
CustomField.label: Transaction Approval Date
